name: Book of Spells
description:
Book of Spells is the first title for Wonderbook™ featuring original writing from J.K. Rowling.
Read, discover, learn and practice spells as well as discover mischievous notes and humorous anecdotal facts relating to the spells. J.K. Rowling has also written a conundrum that leads you through the experience, inviting you to journey through the book rewarding successful students along the way.
